# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I believe we can find common ground to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. I am offering the product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This price reflects my desire to see the product in capable hands while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a successful exchange. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
